problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,BC=6,AC=8,那么sinA的值等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = N_0, BC = N_1, AC = N_2, then the value of sinA is equal to ()
raw_answer:
解:由勾股定理,得
AB=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=10．
由正弦函数的定义,得
sinA=\frac{BC}{AB}=\frac{6}{10}=\frac{3}{5},
故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了锐角三角函数的定义,先求出斜边,再求正弦函数．
